PHRASE.LANG: View instructions for Solo Play and Team Play
Voir les instructions pour le jeu solo et le jeu en équipe
Anleitung für Solo- und Teamspiel anzeigen
Leggi le istruzione per giocatore singolo e squadra
Consulta las instrucciones para jugar solo o en equipo
View instructions for Solo Play and Team Play
View instructions for Solo Play and Team Play

Select your aircraft with [LEFTSTICK] and press [ACCEPT] to confirm. You can exit at any time by pressing [START].

When the Power Meter starts to pulse, press [ALL_REGION_CROSS] when the circle turns green. This will build up your power for take off. Pressing [ALL_REGION_CROSS] at the wrong time reduces your power slightly.

Once the aircraft has taken off you can control it using [LEFTSTICK]. To gain momentum, tilt the aircraft forward or backwards to gain height. Try and prevent it from tilting sideways too much or you will lose height quickly.

Select your aircraft with [LEFTSTICK] and press [ACCEPT] to confirm. You can exit at any time by pressing [START].

When the Power Meter starts to pulse, press [ALL_REGION_CROSS] when the circle turns green. This will build up your power for take off. Pressing [ALL_REGION_CROSS] at the wrong time reduces your power slightly.

Once the aircraft has taken off you can control it using [LEFTSTICK]. To gain momentum, tilt the aircraft forward or backwards to gain height. Try and prevent it from tilting sideways too much or you will lose height quickly.

Select your aircraft with [LEFTSTICK] and press [ACCEPT] to confirm. You can exit at any time by pressing [START].

When the Power Meter starts to pulse, press [ALL_REGION_CROSS] when the circle turns green. This will build up your power for take off. Pressing [ALL_REGION_CROSS] at the wrong time reduces your power slightly.

Once the aircraft has taken off you can control it using [LEFTSTICK]. To gain momentum, tilt the aircraft forward or backwards to gain height. Try and prevent it from tilting sideways too much or you will lose height quickly.
Create your craft and take to the runway in Red Bull Flugtag!
Construisez votre engin et lancez-vous sur la piste du Red Bull Flugtag !
Gestalte dein eigenes Fluggerät und begib auf die Startbahn beim Red Bull Flugtag!
Crea il tuo veicolo e portalo in pista con Red Bull Flugtag!
¡Crea tu propio vehículo y toma la pista en Red Bull Flugtag!
Create your craft and take to the runway in Red Bull Flugtag!
Create your craft and take to the runway in Red Bull Flugtag!

In Solo Entry, you can choose your parts to create the perfect craft. Do your best in the construction and push minigames to achieve better integrity and momentum. Then it’s time to launch your craft over the edge and into the air as you attempt to guide it as far as possible before the inevitable splash landing.

Vous pouvez sélectionner les pièces de votre choix pour créer le parfait objet volant dans le mode Essai Solo. Faites de votre mieux dans les mini-jeux de construction et de poussée pour améliorer l'intégrité et la vitesse de votre engin. Il sera alors temps de lancer votre avion dans le vide et de traverser les cieux alors que vous tenterez de le guider aussi loin que possible avant l'inévitable atterrissage éclaboussant.

Bei einer Soloteilnahme kannst du Komponenten auswählen, um das perfekte Fluggerät zu bauen. Gib in den Minispielen für die Konstruktion und das Anschieben dein Bestes, um so viel Integrität und Schub wie möglich zu erreichen. Dann ist es Zeit, dein Fluggerät von der Startbahn zu schieben, um mit ihm so weit wie möglich zu fliegen, bevor es zur unvermeidlichen Wasserung kommt.

Partecipando come Singolo puoi scegliere le varie parti per creare il veicolo perfetto. Fai del tuo meglio nei minigiochi "costruzione" e "spingi" per ottenere una migliore stabilità e velocità. Lancia il tuo veicolo e fallo librare in volo guidandolo più a lungo possibile fino all'inevitabile atterraggio in acqua.

En la competición individual podrás elegir las partes que quieras para crear el vehículo perfecto. Consigue los mejores resultados en la construcción y los minijuegos de empuje para conseguir mayor resistencia e impulso. Luego prueba a lanzarte a toda velocidad y trata de que tu vehículo se mantenga en el aire el mayor tiempo posible antes del inevitable chapuzón.

In Solo Play, you can choose your parts to create the perfect craft. Do your best in the construction and push minigames to achieve better integrity and momentum. Then it’s time to launch your craft over the edge and into the air as you attempt to guide it as far as possible before the inevitable splash landing.

In Solo Play, you can choose your parts to create the perfect craft. Do your best in the construction and push minigames to achieve better integrity and momentum. Then it’s time to launch your craft over the edge and into the air as you attempt to guide it as far as possible before the inevitable splash landing.

Show your co-operative side in Team Entry with up to three other players. Each player will be assigned a craft part to select and your combined efforts in the construction and push minigames will determine whether your attempt is a total flop or a resounding triumph.

Mettez votre coté coopératif en avant dans un Essai en Equipe avec trois autres joueurs. Chaque joueur devra sélectionner une pièce détachée de l'appareil, et vos efforts conjugués dans les mini-jeux de construction et de poussée détermineront si votre essai est un véritable fiasco ou une victoire éclatante.

Stelle in der Teamteilnahme mit bis zu drei anderen Spielern deine Teamfähigkeit unter Beweis. Jedem Spieler wird ein Teil des Fluggeräts zugewiesen, das er aussuchen kann. Dann entscheiden eure gemeinsame Leistung bei Konstruktion und Anschieben darüber, ob euer Flug ein Reinfall oder ein Triumph wird.

Mostra il tuo lato cooperativo partecipando come Squadra con un massimo di altri 3 giocatori. Ogni giocatore dovrà scegliere una parte del veicolo e i singoli sforzi nei minigiochi "costruisci" e "spingi" si sommeranno per determinare il successo o l'insuccesso della squadra.

Demuestra tu talento y coopera con hasta tres amigos en la competición por equipos. Cada jugador se ocupará de fabricar una parte del vehículo y vuestros esfuerzos en conjunto, junto a los minijuegos de empuje, determinarán vuestro éxito o caída por los aires.

Show your co-operative side in Team Play with up to three other players. Each player will be assigned a craft part to select and your combined efforts in the construction and push minigames will determine whether your attempt is a total flop or a resounding triumph.

Show your co-operative side in Team Play with up to three other players. Each player will be assigned a craft part to select and your combined efforts in the construction and push minigames will determine whether your attempt is a total flop or a resounding triumph.

If your attempt didn’t go as well as you’d hoped, the pilot can choose to try again. This will switch the craft part that each player is responsible for and assign a new pilot, ensuring that every player has the chance to propel their team to the top of the leaderboards.

Si votre essai n'est pas aussi bon que vous l’espériez, le pilote peut choisir de recommencer. Les joueurs échangeront alors les pièces détachées de l'avion dont ils ont la responsabilité et désigneront un nouveau pilote, permettant à chacun d'avoir des chances égales de propulser son équipe au top du classement.

Wenn euer Flug nicht so gelingt, wie ihr es wolltet, kann der Pilot für einen erneuten Versuch stimmen. Dadurch wird jedem Spieler ein neues Teil des Fluggeräts zugewiesen und ein neuer Pilot bestimmt, damit jeder Spieler sein Team an die Spitze der Rangliste bringen kann.

Se il tentativo fallisce, il pilota può scegliere di riprovare. In questo modo cambieranno sia le parti di cui ogni giocatore è responsabile, sia il pilota, così ogni giocatore avrà la possibilità di contribuire a portare la sua squadra in cima alle classifiche.

Si los primeros intentos no tienen resultado, el piloto podrá elegir un nuevo intento para el equipo. Cada miembro se encargará de fabricar una parte diferente y se asignará un nuevo piloto, con tal de que todos los jugadores tengan la oportunidad de rendir y aumentar su marcador al máximo.

If your attempt didn’t go as well as you’d hoped, the pilot can choose to try again. This will switch the craft part that each player is responsible for and assign a new pilot, ensuring that every player has the chance to propel their team to the top of the leaderboards.

If your attempt didn’t go as well as you’d hoped, the pilot can choose to try again. This will switch the craft part that each player is responsible for and assign a new pilot, ensuring that every player has the chance to propel their team to the top of the leaderboards.

Pulsa alternadamente [L1][R1], gira [LEFTSTICK] o agita el mando sin cesar para llenar el medidor
